page.title: 07BREAK-DANCING. A NEW CRAZE!
page.content: { Break Dancing}started about twelve years ago in America.It came to Liverpool but it wasn't popular at first.It has only become really popular in the last three years. It was started by teenagers,mostly coloureds.It began in the{Bronx district of{New York}when two gangs started fighting.One day instead of fighting they made up dances.One gang made up{Break Dancing}& the other made up{Body popping.}Also they started Robotics,jerking the body & moving like a robot.They made up challenges. Break Dancing is movement & double jointed people are the best at special movements like moving your head from side to side.One technique is called {windmills.}You spin on your back with your legs in the air.You can spin on your head or your hand.Other movements are called{moonwalks,swipes & flywalks
